DOC.brief_summary: Background : Nebulizers design influence efficiency aerosol delivery . Performance nebulizer commonly test breathe simulator static parameter . However , breathe pattern vary adult . Objectives : The purpose study evaluate drug deposition different type nebulizer test breathe pattern healthy subject .
DOC.detailed_description: Material Methods The study approve Chang Gung Memorial Foundation Institutional Review Broad . Ten healthy subject , age 20.6Â±0.5 year , recruit . Four nebulizer : 1. constant jet nebulizer ( Neb-easy , Galemed Corp. , Taiwan ) ; 2. breath enhance nebulizer ( Pari LC plus , Pari Inc. , Germany ) ; 3. manual-actuated nebulizer ( A-T Neb , Atlantean Corporation , Taiwan ) ; 4. breath-actuated nebulizer ( AeroElipes , Trudell Medical Inc , Canada ) evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Healthy college subject Currently smoker History asthma Drug allergy Pulmonary disease Heart disease Arrythmia Hyperthyroids Diabetes mellitus Lactacidosis Pregnant Under Bblocker medication
